mapper.insert: insert into category (id, category_name, remark, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{category_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{update_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, category_name, remark, create_time, update_time from category
